MarsFirst: ^Oh, hi Moon! It's been a while, hasn't it?

c-0: ^ Earth and I... we... um... we broke up.
^Oh... I'm so sorry. If you don't mind me asking, what happened?
c-1: ^ I... Mars, I... I really like you...
^Oh! Um, I... I didn't know you felt that way about me...
^But what about Earth? I thought you were still orbiting them...
c-2: ^Really? I haven't seen you out of Earth's orbit... well, ever.
^Wait... Did you two split? What did they do?
g-0: ^They wouldn't listen to me about humans.

s: ^I... I'd rather not talk about it...

c-3: ^ I just felt so... invisible with them. It was like I didn't even exist... even when I would block asteroids for them...
^Oh, I'm so sorry... I just assumed that since you were their only moon, they wouldn't ignore you...
c-4: ^ It was those... humans again. I told Earth to get rid of them, but Earth wouldn't listen to me... even when they l-landed on me...
^They LANDED on you? And Earth didn't do anything about it?
^Wow. That's awful. I wanna sock that guy in the crust every time he lets one of those rovers land on me... I can't even imagine how you must've felt.
c-5: ^Oh... that's alright. Just know I'm here for you.

g-1: ^Both of you are silent for a moment.
^Listen, Moon... if you need somewhere to orbit for a while... you can orbit me.
^HEY! Not if I have anything to say about it!
^You watch as two other moons, Phobos and Deimos, gather near your conversation.
^In case you didn't notice, there's already TWO moons here! Three's a crowd!
^Mars, you wouldn't r-r-replace me, w-would you?

c-6: ^ I... I don't want... to replace...
^Yeah, like I'm buying that! You look like you could fling Phobos into the Asteroid Belt!
^AAAH! Please don't fling me into the Asteroid Belt!
^No one is getting replaced, or flung, or whatever! Moon just needed to talk.
c-7: ^ Hey, do-- do you-- do you mind?
^Um, do YOU mind? We were here first! It's not our fault Earth doesn't love you!
c-8: ^B-but Mercury and Venus don't have any!
^Yeah, why don't you go trauma-dump to one of them?

g-2: ^... y'know, maybe I should just leave...

MarsSecond: ^Oh, hey Moon. Thanks for coming back.
^Cool it, Deimos. You promised you would be nice this time.
^Ugh, fine. Moon, Mars thinks we should give you a chance.
^I want to know why you don't like me.

c-0: ^ Yeah, I think... we could get along...
^I'm still not comfortable to just have you show up and join us. Heck, you scared Phobos half to death.
^I-I'd say closer to two-thirds to death...
c-1: ^ I just want to know... why were you being so rude?
c-2: ^ I just want to know... why were you being so rude?

rude: ^Hey, you're not the only one with feelings here. How would you like it if another moon randomly showed up to orbit with you?

c-0: ^Well, good for you for wanting friends. I'm perfectly fine with having nothing change.

main: ^So excuse me if I'm not exactly keen on you showing up unannounced.

c-0: ^But that's still not an excuse to be mean to them.
^Eh, I'd probably just ignore you. But it's not my fault if Phobos gets scared and I have to say something.
c-1: ^Deimos, you had the exact same reaction when Phobos showed up here. Now you two are inseparable. Couldn't you extend the same camaraderie to Moon?
^... I suppose... but I can't promise it would be today. Or anytime soon.
g-0: ^You look around, but Phobos is nowhere to be seen.
^Great. They're probably hiding from you, Moon.
^I'll talk to them and try to get them calm enough to talk to Moon. You'll probably have to leave us alone for a bit, but I'll let you know when you can come back, OK?

MarsThird: ^Hi again... is this a good time?
^Phobos appears from behind Mars and sheepishly approaches you.

c-0: ^ Hey... I didn't mean to scare you. I'm sorry.
^I-it's fine. I get scared by a lot of things.
^Just so you know, I'm not really scared of you... like, you as a celestial body.
c-1: ^ You're going to stay here. I won't... replace you.
^I... wasn't really scared that you would kick me out completely.
c-2: ^Just so you know, I'm not really scared of you... like, you as a celestial body.
g-0: ^It's more like I was scared that... I would be forgotten.

c-3: ^ Phobos... Mars would never forget you.
^Maybe not on purpose... but Deimos is the first, and you would be the newest. And where would that put me?
^Phobos, I talked with Jupiter earlier. They have almost a hundred moons orbiting them, and yet they make sure none of them are ever left out.
^If they can do that, we can too. And I would never forget you, with Moon or without.
c-4: ^ Deimos would never forget you. They said as much last time I was here.
c-5: ^ Phobos... I know what it's like to be forgotten like that.
^Earth would always ignore me for whatever was going on with the humans on the surface. I was their only moon, too.
^And... it was miserable. It was a big part of why I left them.
^I don't want that to happen to anyone. So I'll never forget you, and Mars won't either.

cry: ^Th-thank you. I really needed to hear that.
^Now if you'll excuse me, I'm going to go cry.
^Phobos drifts away, again hiding behind Mars.
^Oh, don't worry about Phobos. They just get exhausted emotionally after being scared for too long.
deimos: ^... not that you're wrong about that. But I didn't tell you!
^You mean it? You wouldn't forget me?
^Are you kidding? You're my best friend in the whole universe. Moon can take Mars away frm us, but they can never take me away from you.
^Th-thank you. I really needed to hear that.
^... WAIT IS MOON TAKING MARS AWAY FROM US???
^Wait, that's not what I-- aaaaand there they go.
^Phobos had already darted back behind Mars in a panic.
^Yeah, this one's on me. Don't worry, I'll go talk to them.
main: ^So now that you two have gotten a chance to know Moon better, do they have your blessing to orbit with us?
^Ugh, this again. I guess I'm not completely opposed to it anymore, but I don't want to say yes without talking it over with Phobos first. Gimme some time, alright?
^You watch as Deimos retreats behind Mars to talk to Phobos.
^Thanks for being so kind to them. I know they can be a bit hostile to strangers, but they're really not bad when you get to know them.
^I'll let you know what they decide. I'm hoping they can finally accept you.

MarsFourth: ^Hi... you wanted to talk to me again?
^Yeah, the twins had something they wanted to say...
^Hey Moon, I wanted to apologize for being a jerk to you. It was probably uncalled for.
^And I wanted to say sorry for getting so worked up. Though, it will definitely happen again.
^We also wanted to say that if you still wanted to orbit Mars, that would be cool with us.
^Though, if you've found another planet to orbit by now, I totally understand.
^Mars... I would love to orbit you. You've meant the world to me for as long as I can remember.
^And I would love to have you by my side. And I'm sure these two would agree.
^And so, Moon joined Phobos and Deimos in their orbit around Mars. And they were loved, and none were forgotten.
